GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
brcmfmac: pcie: Release firmwares in the brcmf_pcie_setup error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit a88337a06966f2d733ad9a97714b874469133f14, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 82f93cf46d6007ffa003b2d4a2834563b6b84d21. For more details please see the references link.
